query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: status=1 and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid in (@revRoleId@) and est.operateroleid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct mainid,sheetid,title,endtime,senddeptid from est_circuitdispatch est where status=1 and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid = @s1@ and est.operateroleid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: status=1 and OPERATETYPE=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid in (@revRoleId@) and est.operateroleid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct mainid,sheetid,title,endtime,senddeptid from est_circuitdispatch est where status=1 and OPERATETYPE=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid = @s1@ and est.operateroleid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: status=1 and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateuserid in (@revUserId@) and est.operateuserid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct mainid,sheetid,title,endtime,senddeptid from est_circuitdispatch est where status=1 and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateuserid = @s1@ and est.operateuserid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: status=1 and OPERATETYPE=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateuserid in (@revUserId@) and est.operateuserid is not null and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct mainid,sheetid,title,endtime,senddeptid from est_circuitdispatch est where est.status=1 and est.OPERATETYPE=113 and est.linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateuserid in (@revUserId@) and est.operateuserid is not null and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0)
